alert.note: Alert for Pope (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 19 at 4:20PM CDT until July 19 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Pope County in west central Minnesota... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 420 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Starbuck, or 19 miles east of Morris, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southern Pope County, including the following locations... Gilchrist, Sedan, Lake Minnewaska, Glacial Lakes State Park and Long Beach. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
